title: Katseye Member Manon Takes Health Break Amid Group Challenges
summary: Manon Bannerman, a 23-year-old Swiss singer and member of the girl group Katseye, is taking a temporary hiatus to prioritize her health and wellbeing. The group, formed in 2023 with six members, announced this decision after open conversations, emphasizing that Manon is healthy and focusing on self-care. Katseye will continue scheduled performances during her absence, though no timeline for her return has been set. The announcement follows recent high-profile events, such as their Grammy Awards performance and nominations. Additionally, the group has faced significant pressures, including receiving thousands of death threats and online scrutiny, which members like Lara Raj and Manon have described as jarring and terrorizing. Despite these challenges, Katseye remains committed to supporting each other and their fans, as stated by their labels HYBE and Geffen Records.
